channel.title: Comments on: IMPORTANT ANNOUNCEMENT!
channel.description: Stellar Short Fiction by Women-Identified Writers Since 2010

item.title: By: J'nae Rae Spano
item.dc:creator: J'nae Rae Spano
item.description: I hope things are getting better. I've noticed issue 30 is still not out and that the submissions page still shows the last deadline.
item.content:encoded: I hope things are getting better. I’ve noticed issue 30 is still not out and that the submissions page still shows the last deadline.
